subs.text:
@MaxWinebach Problems to solve before folding phones gain significant market share:

Increased ability to withstand daily use (almost as rugged as slab phones)

Lower cost and thus lower retail price.

At significant volume, what's cost adder of the complex hinge and folding display?
subs.rawText:
@MaxWinebach Problems to solve before folding phones gain significant market share:

Increased ability to withstand daily use (almost as rugged as slab phones)

Lower cost and thus lower retail price.

subs.text: @seanhaus @dflieb @googlephotos It would be lovely to offer a way for photos to learn (for a given instance...) what type of photos to skip over (or to emphasize...). Example: I often snap stuff just as a memory aid, not for image. When browsing. need a way to find (or ignore) similar images. let me train it!
